subject: VALIDATION PROCESS FAILURE: S02 - Critical Issues Missed by L1/L2

details.problem: L1 and L2 validation marked S02 as PASS with 'form verified, responsive design confirmed', but L3 independent validation reveals complete application failure
details.actual_state: Application shows infinite loading, Next.js runtime errors, authentication provider infinite loops, 323 PM2 restarts
details.validation_gap: Previous layers either tested wrong deployment or completely failed to verify actual functionality
details.systemic_concern: If L1/L2 can pass a completely broken application, validation process integrity is compromised

immediate_actions_required: Stop all story development until S02 is actually fixed
Investigate L1/L2 validation methodology and evidence
Review validation criteria and evidence requirements
Implement mandatory health checks before marking stories complete
process_improvements: Require actual server logs as validation evidence
Mandate screenshot evidence of working functionality
Independent verification must test live deployment, not localhost
Validation cannot pass without demonstrable user workflow completion
content.recommendation: Immediate process review and team training on validation standards. Current validation failures risk project integrity and delivery quality.
